snippet: But the New York Federal Reserve said its “Empire State” manufacturing index fell, reflecting a slowing in growth.
abstract: Commerce Department says retail sales rose 0.8 percent in March; also reports business inventories rose 0.6 percent in March to a record $1.58 trillion.
lead_paragraph: But the New York Federal Reserve said its “Empire State” manufacturing index fell, reflecting a slowing in growth.

headline.main: Retail Sales Top Forecasts, Jumping 0.8% in March
headline.print_headline: Retail Sales Top Forecasts, Jumping 0.8% in March
